message: Let's be fair, 60-40 is a good deal!
Your offer was a bit too greedy for me. How about we split things a bit more evenly this time? This offer still gives you a slight advantage.
I'll give you a bit more, but I still think I deserve the bigger share.
Alice, let's be real - we both lose if we keep playing this game. A 50/50 split is the fairest and ensures we both walk away with something substantial.
